name: search-cluster
description: Professional aggregated search engine. Features Google, Wiki, Reddit, GNews, and Scrapling.
author: Mema

env_vars.name: GOOGLE_API_KEY
env_vars.description: Google API Key (Required for Google provider)

env_vars.name: GOOGLE_CSE_ID
env_vars.description: Google CSE ID (Required for Google provider)

env_vars.name: SCRAPLING_PYTHON_PATH
env_vars.description: Path to scrapling venv python binary
